attributes.action: change the way party leaders are chosen
attributes.additional_details: The present campaign has shown that the last two standingn candiates are not the first choices of the majority of party members thus changing the system to the one I propose would be a more open and honest choice
attributes.background: The present way new party leaders are chosen is floored. If the total voting was put to the entire party to choose, i.e all candidates stand and are voted on by the wholse party all the way down to the last one . Not being whittled down by MPs and then only the last 2 being voted on by the part.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about how leaders of political parties are chosen is a matter for individual political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
